definitions.definition: transmit (a program or some information) by radio or television.
synonyms: screen "the show will be broadcast worldwide"

definitions.definition: take part in a radio or television transmission.
examples: the station broadcasts 24 hours a day

definitions.definition: tell (something) to many people; make widely known.
examples: we don't want to broadcast our unhappiness to the world
synonyms: trumpet "the result was broadcast far and wide"

definitions.definition: scatter (seeds) by hand or machine rather than placing in drills or rows.
